articles.description: Alex Thompson and Demetrius Denzel-Dyson combined to score 44 points as Samford shot better than 67 percent from the field to fly past The Citadel, 116-103 in a Southern Conference game on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Hot-shooting Samford blows past The Citadel, 116-103

articles.description: Daryl Macon scored at least 20 points for a seventh straight game to help Arkansas get back to .500 in the Southeastern Conference with a 72-54 win over Vanderbilt on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Macon tops 20-point mark again in Arkansas win over Vandy

images.caption: Senior Daryl Macon joins SEC Now to discuss his 21-point game vs. Vanderbilt and how the team is focusing on defense to find success.
images.name: Hogs improving with defensive mindset

articles.description: Jeremiah Bell scored 18 points and Milwaukee held on late to edge Wright State 74-73 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Milwaukee holds on to edge Wright State 74-73

articles.description: Freshman point guard T.J. Starks scored 17 points and Texas A&M toppled No. 24 Kentucky 85-74 on Saturday night in a sold-out and raucous Reed Arena.
articles.headline: Starks has 17 points, Texas A&M beats No. 24 Kentucky 85-74

images.caption: With former Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel courtside, the Aggies make easy work of the No. 24 Wildcats in an 85-74 win.
images.name: Texas A&M hands Kentucky third straight loss

articles.description: Mike Daum had 27 points and 14 rebounds and made all 11 of his foul shots to help South Dakota State beat Oral Roberts 85-75 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Daum leads South Dakota State over Oral Roberts 85-75

articles.description: With former Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel courtside, the Aggies make easy work of the No. 24 Wildcats in an 85-74 win.
articles.headline: Texas A&M hands Kentucky third straight loss
